alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 4:37PM MDT until June 20 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM MDT FOR WESTERN JACKSON AND SOUTHEASTERN PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 437 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Delta 9 Missile Silo to Badlands National Park to 5 miles east of Potato Creek, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cactus Flat, Minuteman Missile Visitors Center, Wanblee, Delta 1 Launch Facility, Eagle Nest Butte and Cottonwood. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 114 and 143. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
